name: TheTenAmendments
0:
”Alexa ask Ten Amendments for First Amendment”
”Alexa ask Ten Amendments to pick an amendment”
”Alexa ask Ten Amendments for all amendments”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ten amendments
des: Having trouble remembering one Amendment, let alone all ten? Well now you can have Alexa tell you all of them one at a time or all together.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
